text:
[Verse]
Stars above us shining bright
Whispers in the cool night air
Dancing shadows left and right
Hold my hand we're almost there

[Verse 2]
Laughter echoes through the trees
Moonlit pathway guides our way
Softly singing to the breeze
In the night we choose to stay

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams in harmony
Light and shadows play for free
Hand in hand just you and me
In these dreams we're wild and free

[Verse 3]
Footprints mark our midnight trail
Every step a tale to tell
Hearts together never frail
In this light our souls will swell

[Verse 4]
Silent whispers all around
In this glow we're spellbound
Hear the night it makes no sound
In this space our love is found

[Bridge]
Let the night consume our fear
In this dream we're always near
Stars above they seem so clear
In this moment all is here
title: Moonlit Dreams
